movie.title: La foresta di ghiaccio
movie.writer: Francesca Manieri, Elisa Amoruso, Claudio Noce
movie.actors: Emir Kusturica, Adriano Giannini, Kseniya Rappoport, Domenico Diele
movie.plot: In the harsh snowy landscape of the Italian Alps, a young technician arrives to repair an electric power plant of a village plagued by blackouts. There, he encounters a strange disappearance.
